mapper.select: SELECT ENO, ENAME, EPERIOD, ECOST, EADDRESS, EPLACE, ESITE, EHOST, ECONTENT, UNO, EVIEWSCNT, ERATING, EXCOORD, EYCOORD FROM teampj.event ORDER BY ENO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT teampj.seq_event.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO teampj.event
VALUES (#{eno}, #{ename}, #{eperiod}, #{ecost}, #{eaddress}, #{eplace}, #{esite}, #{ehost}, #{econtent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE teampj.event SET ENAME = #{ename}, EPERIOD = #{eperiod}, ECOST = #{ecost}, EADDRESS = #{eaddress}, EPLACE = #{eplace}, ESITE = #{esite}, EHOST = #{ehost}, ECONTENT = #{econtent} WHERE ENO = #{eno}
